headline: Britain Gives Green Light To Huawei For 5G Work
abstract: The move shows how an American effort against the Chinese wireless equipment company has stumbled.
lead_paragraph: LONDON â€” Britain said on Tuesday that it would not ban equipment made by the Chinese technology giant Huawei from being used in its new high-speed 5G wireless network, the starkest sign yet that an American campaign against the telecommunications company is faltering.
